subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobiles
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Penske Racing will switch to Ford from Dodge in Nascar competition beginning in 2013, a move the team believes will help Roger Penske finally win a Sprint Cup championship.
snippet: Penske Racing will switch to Ford from Dodge in Nascar competition beginning in 2013, a move the team believes will help Roger Penske finally win a Sprint Cup championship.
